title: Experienced SHOPIFY Product Lister and Researcher
job_overview:
Seasoned Shopify Experts Wanted – Join Us to Shape the Next Big E-Commerce Brand

We’re not looking for beginners—we’re looking for proven professionals who’ve been in the trenches of e-commerce. If you’ve already mastered product research, built high-converting Shopify listings, and know exactly what it takes to turn a product into a bestseller—we want to hear from you.

Why This Role Stands Out

As a fast-scaling brand, we’re building a team of high-level experts who know how to move the needle. This isn’t about trial and error—we’re looking for someone who brings experience, strategy, and sharp instincts to the table. If you know how to find products before they explode and you’ve listed hundreds (or thousands) of winning products, this role has your name on it.

What You’ll Own

Product Research with Purpose – You won’t just guess—you’ll use real tools, data, and experience to uncover what’s trending and what sells.

Listing Creation That Sells – You know how to write descriptions that hook buyers and lead them straight to checkout.

Conversion Optimization – You understand how small details impact performance and aren’t afraid to tweak until results peak.

Visual Merchandising – You’ve worked with images and layouts enough to know what drives clicks and conversions.

What We’re Looking For

Experienced Shopify Specialist – You’ve done this before and have results to show for it.

Strong Trend-Spotting Skills – You’re quick to recognize what’s hot and why it matters.

Copywriting That Converts – Your writing persuades, not just informs.

Design Awareness – You know how to present products in a way that makes them shine.

Proactive Thinker – You take initiative, bring ideas, and look for ways to improve and scale.

Ready to Apply?

We don’t need a formal cover letter. Instead, tell us what you’ve done.

Share your experience working with Shopify product research and listing. How do you find winners? What’s your method for creating high-performing product pages? Let us know which tools you use and share results you’re proud of. Have you worked on successful Shopify stores? Send us links or screenshots!

Extra points if you’ve worked with fast-growing e-commerce brands—show us your best work.

What’s in It for You

A full-time, long-term role with a company that values expertise.

The chance to work with a driven, experienced team on exciting projects.

Flexibility to work remotely and independently.

Growth opportunities in a company that’s scaling fast.

If you’re confident in your experience and hungry to be part of something big, let’s talk.

(And just to make sure you’re paying attention—include your favorite color in your message.)

Let’s create something incredible—together.
